right now we are stuck because our first

i know you might be thinking just don't

this youtube videos are compared against

used to seeing if i have a raw chicken

explain that to me they're both food
they're both animals if the chicken

experiences that may be exotic to some

youtube is doing a big disservice to

in the west especially in the usa people

most of people who leave bad comments on
their videos you would think it's vegans
it's people who eat meat who have some
kind of cognitive dissonance who can't
like put together the fact that meat

important that people take stock in the

otherwise i think america and the west

people are going to miss out on
